title: Lang2Lift: A Framework for Language-Guided Pallet Detection and Pose Estimation Integrated in Autonomous Outdoor Forklift Operation
summary: The logistics and construction industries face persistent challenges in automating pallet handling, especially in outdoor environments with variable payloads, inconsistencies in pallet quality and dimensions, and unstructured surroundings. In this paper, we tackle automation of a critical step in pallet transport: the pallet pick-up operation.
